user.title: ČEZ HDO Setup
user.description: Enter your EAN number from ČEZ Distribuce invoice.

data_description.ean: 18-digit EAN number from your electricity invoice

signal.title: Select HDO Signal
signal.description:
{signal_count} HDO signal(s) found for your location.

**If you don't know your signal**, select the first one. You can also find your signal in your contract with ČEZ Distribuce.

data_description.signal: HDO signal code for your tariff switching times

prices.title: Tariff Prices Setup
prices.description: Set prices for low (NT) and high (VT) tariff. Prices are used for cost calculations in the card.

data_description.low_tariff_price: Price per kWh in low tariff
data_description.high_tariff_price: Price per kWh in high tariff

error.cannot_connect: Failed to verify EAN. Please check manually on ČEZ Distribuce website: https://dip.cezdistribuce.cz/irj/portal/anonymous/casy-spinani/
error.invalid_ean: Invalid EAN number. No HDO data found for this EAN. You can verify manually at https://dip.cezdistribuce.cz/irj/portal/anonymous/casy-spinani/

init.title: Change ČEZ HDO Settings
init.description: Change EAN or HDO signal. Validation against ČEZ API will be performed after confirmation.

data_description.ean: 18-digit EAN number from your electricity invoice

signal.title: Select HDO Signal

**If you don't know your signal**, select the first one. You can also find your signal in your contract with ČEZ Distribuce.
